div.p: This value set expansion contains 10 concepts.

td.a: Three DTP primary series doses were administered-124

tr.td: Three DTP primary series doses were administered

td.a: One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-141

tr.td: One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

td.a: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose-114

tr.td: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

td.a: Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered-140

tr.td: Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered

td.a: The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered less than 1 year ago-131

tr.td: The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered less than 1 year ago

td.a: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose-118

tr.td: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

td.a: The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago-131

tr.td: The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago

td.a: Three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered-140

tr.td: Three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered

td.a: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete-119

tr.td: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTDTPPregnancyStartingWith4Doses for IMMZ.D2.DT.DTP.Pregnancy starting with 4 doses. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Diphtheria and tetanus vaccination schedule in pregnant women who received 4 childhood DTP doses
